['', ' At least 1 year of experience with relational databases ', " Creative: You thrive on bringing definition to big, undefined problems. You love asking questions and pushing hard to find answers. You're not afraid to share a new idea. ", " As a Data Scientist on Capital One's People Analytics team, you'll be on the leading edge of applying analytics to talent, combining machine learning and social science to build strategies that expand Capital One's talent advantage. ", " At least 3 years' experience with machine learning ", " At least 3 years' experience in Python, Scala, or R ", ' Writing white papers that explain predictive models you have developed ', ' Build models and perform analyses centered on helping Capital One assess and select great talent. ', ' Data is at the center of everything we do. As a startup, we disrupted the credit card industry by individually personalizing every credit card offer using statistical modeling and the relational database, cutting edge technology in 1988! Fast-forward a few years, and this little innovation and our passion for data has skyrocketed us to a Fortune 100 company and a leader in the world of data-driven decision-making. ', ' Supporting our efforts to deploy assessment technologies using best in class fairness methods. ', " Technical: You're comfortable with open-source languages and are passionate about developing further. You have hands-on experience developing data science solutions using open-source tools and cloud computing platforms. ", 'At least 1 year experience with NLP', 'In This Role, You Will', " Statistically-minded: You've built models, validated them, and backtested them. You know how to interpret a confusion matrix or a ROC curve. You have experience with clustering, classification, sentiment analysis, time series, NLP and deep learning. ", ' Build predictive models through all phases of development, from design through training, evaluation, validation, and implementation ', ' At least 1 year of experience in open source programming languages for large scale data analysis ', 'Team Description', 'These Could Include', ' Building custom models to assess quality of hire for a given function or more broadly, all in service of developing better candidate assessment solutions ', ' Master\'s Degree in "STEM" field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics) plus 3 years of experience in data analytics, or PhD in "STEM" field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics)  At least 1 year of experience working with AWS At least 1 year experience with NLP At least 3 years\' experience in Python, Scala, or R  At least 3 years\' experience with machine learning  At least 3 years\' experience with SQL ', ' Innovative: You continually research and evaluate emerging technologies. You stay current on published state-of-the-art methods, technologies, and applications and seek out opportunities to apply them. ', 'Preferred Qualifications', " Bachelor's Degree plus 5 years of experience in data analytics, or Master's Degree plus 3 years in data analytics, or PhD ", ' Optimizing each aspect of our recruiting operation from assessing, selecting and hiring candidates to sourcing & engaging them. ', " Bachelor's Degree plus 5 years of experience in data analytics, or Master's Degree plus 3 years in data analytics, or PhD  At least 1 year of experience in open source programming languages for large scale data analysis  At least 1 year of experience with machine learning  At least 1 year of experience with relational databases ", 'The Ideal Candidate is', " At least 3 years' experience with SQL ", 'Role Description', ' At least 1 year of experience working with AWS ', ' At least 1 year of experience with machine learning ', ' Capital One will consider sponsoring a new qualified applicant for employment authorization for this position.', ' Flex your interpersonal skills to translate the complexity of your work into tangible business outcomes ', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Master\'s Degree in "STEM" field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics) plus 3 years of experience in data analytics, or PhD in "STEM" field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics) ', ' The People Analytics Center of Excellence at Capital One is a 75 person cross-functional team of analysts, consultants, and data scientists. The People Analytics Talent Assessment & Analytics team builds models that help Capital One assess and select great talent. We partner with vendors to implement world class assessment solutions for the business, as well as develop our own. We derive insights, build models and develop strategies using Python, AWS, and other open-source technology. We deliver analytics to internal customers in intelligent and real time custom web applications. ', ' Leverage a broad stack of technologies - Python, AWS, GitHub RedShift, and more - to reveal the insights hidden within huge volumes of recruiting data ']

job_title: Sr UX Researcher - AWS Supply Chain
job_text: ['', ' Collaborate and communicate effectively within cross-functional teams that span design, product, engineering, and management.', ' Master’s degree in human factors, cognitive psychology, cognitive science, human-centered design, anthropology, or related discipline.', ' BA/BS in psychology, sociology, anthropology, human computer interaction or related discipline.', 'Company', ' Perform all aspects of the UX research lifecycle (study design, recruiting, moderation, analysis, reporting, communicating) for products being used by a wide range of users working with code, data, and machine learning models on the AWS AI platform: data scientists, data engineers, machine learning researchers, analysts, and students.', ' 5+ year of hands-on experience conducting UX research for complex interactive software applications.', ' Prior design UX research experience in the field of data science, developer tools, and machine learning tools.', ' Strong behavioral research and analysis skills, (designing, conducting, and analyzing data from different kinds of research methodologies.)', ' Master’s degree in human factors, cognitive psychology, cognitive science, human-centered design, anthropology, or related discipline. Hands-on experience with a wide range of research methodologies and approaches, including card sorting, tree testing, prototype testing, concept evaluation, think aloud usability studies, surveys, semi-structured interviews, etc. Strong behavioral research and analysis skills, (designing, conducting, and analyzing data from different kinds of research methodologies.) Strong communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills including the ability to communicate complex concepts clearly and persuasively across different audiences and varying levels of the organization. Ability to organize, plan, and stay ahead of the work. Prior design UX research experience in the field of data science, developer tools, and machine learning tools. Strong command of quantitative, behavioral analysis and statistics. Experience with agile software development and how UX research fits in. Experience with and knowledge of data visualization. Meets/exceeds Amazon’s leadership principles requirements for this role Meets/exceeds Amazon’s functional/technical depth and complexity for this role', ' Meets/exceeds Amazon’s functional/technical depth and complexity for this role', ' Hands-on experience with a wide range of research methodologies and approaches, including card sorting, tree testing, prototype testing, concept evaluation, think aloud usability studies, surveys, semi-structured interviews, etc.', ' Collaborate on UX research projects with open source projects in the data and machine learning space, including Project Jupyter.', ' Perform quick but thorough data analysis in order to uncover insightful and actionable results that drive tactical and strategic product decisions.', ' Strong communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills including the ability to communicate complex concepts clearly and persuasively across different audiences and varying levels of the organization.', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Work closely with the design and product management teams to define, measure and communicate UX research metrics and guidelines around the various customer experience solutions evaluated.', 'Description', ' Understand product roadmaps and be able to translate them into long-term, as well as, short term UX research plans.', ' Strong command of quantitative, behavioral analysis and statistics.', ' A strong portfolio demonstrating past work experience, deliverables, and the ability to extract actionable insights from qualitative and quantitative data.', ' Perform all aspects of the UX research lifecycle (study design, recruiting, moderation, analysis, reporting, communicating) for products being used by a wide range of users working with code, data, and machine learning models on the AWS AI platform: data scientists, data engineers, machine learning researchers, analysts, and students. Collaborate and communicate effectively within cross-functional teams that span design, product, engineering, and management. Collaborate on UX research projects with open source projects in the data and machine learning space, including Project Jupyter. Identify and prioritize research questions based on the analysis of existing product designs, business needs, project goals and risks. Perform quick but thorough data analysis in order to uncover insightful and actionable results that drive tactical and strategic product decisions. Understand product roadmaps and be able to translate them into long-term, as well as, short term UX research plans. Work closely with the design and product management teams to define, measure and communicate UX research metrics and guidelines around the various customer experience solutions evaluated.', ' Experience with agile software development and how UX research fits in.', ' 5+ year of hands-on experience conducting UX research for complex interactive software applications. BA/BS in psychology, sociology, anthropology, human computer interaction or related discipline. A strong portfolio demonstrating past work experience, deliverables, and the ability to extract actionable insights from qualitative and quantitative data.', ' Meets/exceeds Amazon’s leadership principles requirements for this role', ' Experience with and knowledge of data visualization.', ' Ability to organize, plan, and stay ahead of the work.', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Identify and prioritize research questions based on the analysis of existing product designs, business needs, project goals and risks.']

job_text: ['', ' Continually improve operational excellence.', ' Help with hiring.', ' Be part of “two pizza” scrum team.', ' Experience building tools for data scientists and developers.', ' Deep hands-on technical expertise in: large scale systems engineering and/or full-stack development.', 'Company', ' Proficiency in Python or JavaScript/TypeScript.', ' Engage with open source and online ML education communities, staying abreast, influencing direction, and making contributions.', ' Engage with the maintainers of Jupyter/JupyterLab, nteract, etc. and make meaningful contributions to keep SageMaker on the cutting-edge.', ' Work closely with senior and principal engineers to architect and develop the best technical design.', ' Programming experience with at least one modern language such as Java, C++, or C# including object-oriented design', ' Machine learning knowledge and experience.', ' Proficiency with notebook software (Jupyter, nteract, Zeppelin)', ' Experience in communicating with users, other technical teams, and management to collect requirements, describe software product features, and technical designs.', 'Engineers On This Team Get To', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Description', ' Ability to take a project from scoping requirements through actual launch of the project.', ' Support online ML education providers (e.g., fast.ai, Udacity) to develop the next generation of ML engineers .', ' Experience building complex software systems that have been successfully delivered to customers.', ' 1+ years of experience contributing to the architecture and design (architecture, design patterns, reliability and scaling) of new and current systems.', ' Engage with the maintainers of Jupyter/JupyterLab, nteract, etc. and make meaningful contributions to keep SageMaker on the cutting-edge. Support online ML education providers (e.g., fast.ai, Udacity) to develop the next generation of ML engineers . Be very close to end customers as develop/combine open source software and examples to make a compelling customer experience. Develop/maintain operational rigor for a fast-growing AWS service.', " Work closely with senior and principal engineers to architect and develop the best technical design. Continually improve operational excellence. Be part of “two pizza” scrum team. Engage with open source and online ML education communities, staying abreast, influencing direction, and making contributions. Collaborate with other SageMaker SDE's for features that cut across SageMaker. Engage with customers and other AWS partners. Help with hiring.", ' 2+ years of non-internship professional software development experience Programming experience with at least one modern language such as Java, C++, or C# including object-oriented design 1+ years of experience contributing to the architecture and design (architecture, design patterns, reliability and scaling) of new and current systems.', ' Knowledge of professional software engineering practices & best practices for the full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations.', ' Develop/maintain operational rigor for a fast-growing AWS service.', ' Proficiency in Python or JavaScript/TypeScript. Machine learning knowledge and experience. Active engagement with an open source community. Experience building tools for data scientists and developers. Proficiency with notebook software (Jupyter, nteract, Zeppelin) (Optional) Frontend development experience with React, TypeScript for web-based IDE innovation. Experience building complex software systems that have been successfully delivered to customers. Knowledge of professional software engineering practices & best practices for the full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations. Ability to take a project from scoping requirements through actual launch of the project. Experience in communicating with users, other technical teams, and management to collect requirements, describe software product features, and technical designs. Deep hands-on technical expertise in: large scale systems engineering and/or full-stack development.', ' Active engagement with an open source community.', ' 2+ years of non-internship professional software development experience', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Key Responsibilities', ' Engage with customers and other AWS partners.', ' (Optional) Frontend development experience with React, TypeScript for web-based IDE innovation.', ' Be very close to end customers as develop/combine open source software and examples to make a compelling customer experience.', " Collaborate with other SageMaker SDE's for features that cut across SageMaker."]

['', ' At least 1 year of experience with relational databases ', " Creative: You thrive on bringing definition to big, undefined problems. You love asking questions and pushing hard to find answers. You're not afraid to share a new idea. ", " As a Data Scientist on Capital One's People Analytics team, you'll be on the leading edge of applying analytics to talent, combining machine learning and social science to build strategies that expand Capital One's talent advantage. ", " At least 3 years' experience with machine learning ", " At least 3 years' experience in Python, Scala, or R ", ' Writing white papers that explain predictive models you have developed ', ' Build models and perform analyses centered on helping Capital One assess and select great talent. ', ' Data is at the center of everything we do. As a startup, we disrupted the credit card industry by individually personalizing every credit card offer using statistical modeling and the relational database, cutting edge technology in 1988! Fast-forward a few years, and this little innovation and our passion for data has skyrocketed us to a Fortune 100 company and a leader in the world of data-driven decision-making. ', ' Supporting our efforts to deploy assessment technologies using best in class fairness methods. ', " Technical: You're comfortable with open-source languages and are passionate about developing further. You have hands-on experience developing data science solutions using open-source tools and cloud computing platforms. ", 'At least 1 year experience with NLP', 'In This Role, You Will', " Statistically-minded: You've built models, validated them, and backtested them. You know how to interpret a confusion matrix or a ROC curve. You have experience with clustering, classification, sentiment analysis, time series, NLP and deep learning. ", ' Build predictive models through all phases of development, from design through training, evaluation, validation, and implementation ', ' At least 1 year of experience in open source programming languages for large scale data analysis ', 'Team Description', 'These Could Include', ' Building custom models to assess quality of hire for a given function or more broadly, all in service of developing better candidate assessment solutions ', ' Master\'s Degree in "STEM" field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics) plus 3 years of experience in data analytics, or PhD in "STEM" field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics)  At least 1 year of experience working with AWS At least 1 year experience with NLP At least 3 years\' experience in Python, Scala, or R  At least 3 years\' experience with machine learning  At least 3 years\' experience with SQL ', ' Innovative: You continually research and evaluate emerging technologies. You stay current on published state-of-the-art methods, technologies, and applications and seek out opportunities to apply them. ', 'Preferred Qualifications', " Bachelor's Degree plus 5 years of experience in data analytics, or Master's Degree plus 3 years in data analytics, or PhD ", ' Optimizing each aspect of our recruiting operation from assessing, selecting and hiring candidates to sourcing & engaging them. ', " Bachelor's Degree plus 5 years of experience in data analytics, or Master's Degree plus 3 years in data analytics, or PhD  At least 1 year of experience in open source programming languages for large scale data analysis  At least 1 year of experience with machine learning  At least 1 year of experience with relational databases ", 'The Ideal Candidate is', " At least 3 years' experience with SQL ", 'Role Description', ' At least 1 year of experience working with AWS ', ' At least 1 year of experience with machine learning ', ' Capital One will consider sponsoring a new qualified applicant for employment authorization for this position.', ' Flex your interpersonal skills to translate the complexity of your work into tangible business outcomes ', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Master\'s Degree in "STEM" field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics) plus 3 years of experience in data analytics, or PhD in "STEM" field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics) ', ' The People Analytics Center of Excellence at Capital One is a 75 person cross-functional team of analysts, consultants, and data scientists. The People Analytics Talent Assessment & Analytics team builds models that help Capital One assess and select great talent. We partner with vendors to implement world class assessment solutions for the business, as well as develop our own. We derive insights, build models and develop strategies using Python, AWS, and other open-source technology. We deliver analytics to internal customers in intelligent and real time custom web applications. ', ' Leverage a broad stack of technologies - Python, AWS, GitHub RedShift, and more - to reveal the insights hidden within huge volumes of recruiting data ']

['', ' Design, build, and maintain automated reporting, dashboards, and ongoing analysis to enable data driven decisions across our team and with partner teams. Identify, develop, manage, and execute analyses to uncover areas of opportunity and present written business recommendations that will shape the future of AGC Write high-quality SQL queries to retrieve and analyze data from database tables (ex. Redshift, S3, Athena etc.) Report key insight trends, using statistical rigor to simplify and inform the larger team of noteworthy trends that impact the business. Collaborate with product managers, Data Engineers/Scientists, and operational leaders to gather data and metrics requirements.', ' Report key insight trends, using statistical rigor to simplify and inform the larger team of noteworthy trends that impact the business.', 'Company', ' Experience using Python,R etc. Extensive experience in a data engineer or BIE role with a technology company Experience with AWS services including S3, Redshift, EMR and RDS Strong verbal/written communication and data presentation skills, including an ability to effectively communicate with both business and technical teams', ' Extensive experience in a data engineer or BIE role with a technology company', 'Responsibilities', " Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, or a related quantitative field", 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Description', ' Be self-driven, and show ability to deliver on ambiguous projects with incomplete or dirty data', " An ability and interest in working in a fast-paced and rapidly-changing environment Be self-driven, and show ability to deliver on ambiguous projects with incomplete or dirty data Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, or a related quantitative field 3+ years analyzing and interpreting data Experience with data mining and processing using SQL Experience building measures and metrics, and developing reporting solutions using BI data visualization and delivery tools such as Power BI, Tableau, Qlik, Quicksight, etc.", ' Design, build, and maintain automated reporting, dashboards, and ongoing analysis to enable data driven decisions across our team and with partner teams.', ' An ability and interest in working in a fast-paced and rapidly-changing environment', ' Write high-quality SQL queries to retrieve and analyze data from database tables (ex. Redshift, S3, Athena etc.)', ' Collaborate with product managers, Data Engineers/Scientists, and operational leaders to gather data and metrics requirements.', ' Strong verbal/written communication and data presentation skills, including an ability to effectively communicate with both business and technical teams', ' 3+ years analyzing and interpreting data', ' Experience building measures and metrics, and developing reporting solutions using BI data visualization and delivery tools such as Power BI, Tableau, Qlik, Quicksight, etc.', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Experience using Python,R etc.', ' Experience with AWS services including S3, Redshift, EMR and RDS', ' Identify, develop, manage, and execute analyses to uncover areas of opportunity and present written business recommendations that will shape the future of AGC', ' Experience with data mining and processing using SQL']

job_text: ['', ' Experience incorporating research in the software, design, and product development lifecycle.', ' Strong command of quantitative data analysis and inferential statistics', ' Synthesize a wide range of primary and secondary data types to perform quick and thorough analyses leading to focused, insightful, and actionable findings.', ' Experience incorporating research in the software, design, and product development lifecycle. Demonstrated effectiveness ensuring insights are broadly understood by the organization and result in improved customer outcomes Broad experience with the full range of research methods: qualitative and quantitative, attitudinal and behavioral, with deep expertise in one or more areas Ability to mentor and guide others to successful outcomes Strategic, business-building approach to UX research with a passion for translating data into bottom-line impact Experience researching and developing experiences for global markets Passion for understanding the latest learnings and innovations in behavioral science, research methods, and UX design and applying these to your work 8+ years of hands-on experience conducting UX and market research in an applied setting Experience building and managing research teams and mentoring others MA/MS in psychology, sociology, anthropology, human computer interaction or related discipline Ph.D. degree in applied behavioral science, human-computer interaction (HCI), psychology, or related discipline Strong command of quantitative data analysis and inferential statistics', ' BA/BS in psychology, sociology, anthropology, human computer interaction or related discipline', 'Company', ' Ability to mentor and guide others to successful outcomes', ' Translate insights into measurable customer experience outcomes aligned to business goals.', ' MA/MS in psychology, sociology, anthropology, human computer interaction or related discipline', ' Passion for understanding the latest learnings and innovations in behavioral science, research methods, and UX design and applying these to your work', 'In This Role, You Will', ' Provide mentorship to UX designers to scale the practice of research within our team.', ' Ph.D. degree in applied behavioral science, human-computer interaction (HCI), psychology, or related discipline', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Description', ' Create and execute against long-term research roadmaps that align to and inform high-level business strategy and user experience goals. Define and execute and invent research methods appropriate to the questions at hand, including but not limited to field research, surveys, lab studies, remote testing, and A-B tests. Assure the right research questions are being asked; educate the organization on opportunities revealed by your own research. Synthesize a wide range of primary and secondary data types to perform quick and thorough analyses leading to focused, insightful, and actionable findings. Translate insights into measurable customer experience outcomes aligned to business goals. Guide internal teams and partners to take action aligned with research findings – inspire them and help them internalize opportunities to delight customers. Provide mentorship to UX designers to scale the practice of research within our team. Provide thought leadership to product teams, the broader AVS organization, and our partners. Build up repeatable research practices and resources that are leveraged within the UX Design Team, and by other teams across AVS.', ' Experience building and managing research teams and mentoring others', ' 8+ years of hands-on experience conducting UX and market research in an applied setting', ' Create and execute against long-term research roadmaps that align to and inform high-level business strategy and user experience goals.', ' Build up repeatable research practices and resources that are leveraged within the UX Design Team, and by other teams across AVS.', 'Learn More About Our Services And Team Here', ' Experience designing and running original experimental research on digital products and services', ' Experience researching and developing experiences for global markets', ' Broad experience with the full range of research methods: qualitative and quantitative, attitudinal and behavioral, with deep expertise in one or more areas', ' Experience designing and running original experimental research on digital products and services Ability to independently drive multiple concurrent projects in an agile environment BA/BS in psychology, sociology, anthropology, human computer interaction or related discipline A portfolio demonstrating past work experience and deliverables (e.g.: study plans, reports, and data visualizations)', ' Define and execute and invent research methods appropriate to the questions at hand, including but not limited to field research, surveys, lab studies, remote testing, and A-B tests.', ' Ability to independently drive multiple concurrent projects in an agile environment', ' Demonstrated effectiveness ensuring insights are broadly understood by the organization and result in improved customer outcomes', ' Assure the right research questions are being asked; educate the organization on opportunities revealed by your own research.', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Guide internal teams and partners to take action aligned with research findings – inspire them and help them internalize opportunities to delight customers.', ' A portfolio demonstrating past work experience and deliverables (e.g.: study plans, reports, and data visualizations)', ' Provide thought leadership to product teams, the broader AVS organization, and our partners.', ' Strategic, business-building approach to UX research with a passion for translating data into bottom-line impact']

incomplete information.', ' Experience owning roadmap strategy and definition', ' Proven record of complex and creative problem-solving.', ' Ability to align the immediate engineering and product a product', ' Work with the business team on the Go-To-Market, including launch and driving adoption.', ' Understand and contribute to the overall business strategy and priorities.', ' Working knowledge of SQL and proficient in Excel.', ' Experience writing and communicating product strategy, product roadmap and business requirements documents.', ' Work with engineering teams across groups, unblocking them as needed, and ensuring timely & quality delivery.', ' Experience working in a new business area growing within a large corporation.', ' Superior verbal and written communications skills.', " 2+ years of experience with end to end product delivery 5+ years of technical product management, program management or engineering experience Bachelor's Degree Experience contributing to engineering discussions around technology decisions and strategy related to a product Experience owning roadmap strategy and definition Experience owning feature delivery and tradeoffs of a product 5+ years of experience in digital product management, at least two of which in online advertising. Bachelor's Degree in engineering, math, science or other quantitative field. Experience managing full software development lifecycle for B2B products. Experience working closely with engineers and data scientists to deliver products on ambitious deadlines. Experience owning a roadmap for a set of features or products. Experience writing and communicating product strategy, product roadmap and business requirements documents. Ability to understand business and technical tradeoffs and make decisions with incomplete information. Ability to align the immediate engineering and product teams and the larger organization around the roadmap. Ability to work well with engineers and data scientist at multiple technical levels. Working knowledge of SQL and proficient in Excel.", ' Experience working closely with engineers and data scientists to deliver products on ambitious deadlines.', ' MBA or equivalent business experience.', ' 5+ years of experience in digital product management, at least two of which in online advertising.', " Bachelor's Degree", 'Basic Qualifications', ' Experience contributing to engineering discussions around technology decisions and strategy related to a product', 'Responsibilities Include', ' Perform all of the above with a data-driven perspective, from the data that support and validate the roadmap to the metrics to evaluate successful adoption and performance.', " Bachelor's Degree in engineering, math, science or other quantitative field.", ' Ability to work well with engineers and data scientist at multiple technical levels.', ' Gather input and feedback from brand advertisers, retail customers, and internal stakeholders. Understand and contribute to the overall business strategy and priorities. Write Working Backwards, Business Requirements and API/UI workflow documents. Own and prioritize the backlog and roadmap for specific advertiser targeting, recommendations and reporting features. Work with engineering teams across groups, unblocking them as needed, and ensuring timely & quality delivery. Work with the business team on the Go-To-Market, including launch and driving adoption. Perform all of the above with a data-driven perspective, from the data that support and validate the roadmap to the metrics to evaluate successful adoption and performance.', ' MBA or equivalent business experience. Experience working in a new business area growing within a large corporation. Superior verbal and written communications skills. Proven record of complex and creative problem-solving. Entrepreneurial spirit and desire to grow and learn in one of the most innovative companies in the world .', ' Own and prioritize the backlog and roadmap for specific advertiser targeting, recommendations and reporting features.', ' 2+ years of experience with end to end product delivery']

You continually research and evaluate emerging technologies. You stay current on the changing landscape as well as published state-of-the-art ML methods, technologies, and applications. You ask why, explore and openly share your disruptive ideas. Business-Minded. You can analyze customer needs and drive towards impactful business outcomes.', ' Technical. You are independent and can develop your own algorithms and experiments. You have hands-on experience developing NLP solutions, from concept to production, and selecting the right tool for the job at hand. You have significant experience with cloud computing, systems architecture, and IAAS. You are fluent in Python and comfortable with C/C++, Go, or Java/Scala.']

['', 'At Least 4 Years Of Experience With Machine Learning', ' At least 4 years of experience with relational databases ', ' Data is at the center of everything we do. As a startup, we disrupted the credit card industry by individually personalizing every credit card offer using statistical modeling and the relational database, cutting edge technology in 1988! Fast-forward a few years, and this little innovation and our passion for data has skyrocketed us to a Fortune 200 company and a leader in the world of data-driven decision-making. ', ' PhD in Computer Science (Machine Learning, Statistics, Math or equivalent) plus 5 years of experience in data analytics ', " Bachelor's Degree plus 9 years of experience in data analytics, or Master's Degree plus 7 years of experience in data analytics, or PhD plus 5 years of experience in data analytics ", ' At least 5 years of experience in Python, Scala, or R for large scale data analysis ', ' Team oriented: You excel at partnering with cross functional teams to champion the field of data science achieve collective goals ', 'In This Role, You Will', ' At least 3 year of experience working with AWS ', ' Build and deliver a comprehensive machine learning roadmap across bank customer life cycle from account opening to account management that enables customer base growth and faster access to money while preventing fraudulent activity ', " A Leader. You challenge conventional thinking and work with stakeholders to identify and improve the status quo. You're passionate about talent development for your own team and beyond ", 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Lead a data science team and build machine learning models through all phases of development, from design, testing, data gathering, training, evaluation, validation, and implementation ', 'The Ideal Candidate Is', ' Achiever. You at ease in a fast pace environment defending against fraud and are driven for action and get things done ', ' Build and deliver a comprehensive machine learning roadmap across bank customer life cycle from account opening to account management that enables customer base growth and faster access to money while preventing fraudulent activity  Partner with senior leaders and partner teams in problem framing and conception of ideas, develop consensus and execute on the machine learning agenda  Lead a data science team and build machine learning models through all phases of development, from design, testing, data gathering, training, evaluation, validation, and implementation  Partner with a cross-functional team of product managers, software engineers, and business analysts to launch machine learning solutions into production  Actively identify and manage model risks in line with model risk management policies  Identify, evaluate, and deploy new algorithms, data strategies, testing strategy, and implementation capabilities to drive continuous innovation  Lead, recruit, and grow a team of data scientists to achieve their professional goals ', 'At Least 3 Year Of Experience Managing People', ' Partner with a cross-functional team of product managers, software engineers, and business analysts to launch machine learning solutions into production ', ' Lead, recruit, and grow a team of data scientists to achieve their professional goals ', " The Customer Protection Data Science team has a relentless focus on the craft of data sciences spanning statistics, machine learning and distributed computing domains. Our relentless innovation is aimed towards continually identifying fraud attacks across every stage of the customer life cycle. You will be working with cross functional teams including product, engineers and business analysts to identify and enable real-time intelligent decisions as part of our defenses. This is core to delivering the Bank's mission of Changing Banking for Good as it will enable easy access to banking services to all consumers. ", " Experienced. You've built machine learning models over TB scale data, validated them, back tested them and know what it takes to launch them in a real-time production environment ", ' Capital One will consider sponsoring a new qualified applicant for employment authorization for this position.', " The mission of this role is to drive the continual transformation of Capital One Consumer Bank's Customer Protection Data Science division. As the leading machine learning group, defining the next generation of banking, you will drive innovation that hardens our defenses against various types of bank fraud. In this role, you'll be central to determining our vision and strategy for machine learning applications in fraud detection and prevention that deeply impact the lives and financial freedom of our 12 million consumer bank customers. ", 'Basic Qualifications', ' At least 10 years of experience applying machine learning to solve complex problems for large scale applications ', ' Innovative. You continually research and evaluate emerging technologies. You stay current on published state-of-the-art methods, technologies, and applications and seek out opportunities to apply them ', ' At least 4 years of experience in open source programming languages for large scale data analysis ', ' Actively identify and manage model risks in line with model risk management policies ', " As a Data Scientist at Capital One, you'll be part of a team that's leading the next wave of disruption at a whole new scale, using the latest in computing technologies and machine learning methods that operate across billions of customer records to unlock the big opportunities that help everyday people save money, time and agony in their financial lives. ", ' Identify, evaluate, and deploy new algorithms, data strategies, testing strategy, and implementation capabilities to drive continuous innovation ', ' Partner with senior leaders and partner teams in problem framing and conception of ideas, develop consensus and execute on the machine learning agenda ']

['', 'At Least 4 Years Of Experience With Machine Learning', ' At least 4 years of experience with relational databases ', ' Data is at the center of everything we do. As a startup, we disrupted the credit card industry by individually personalizing every credit card offer using statistical modeling and the relational database, cutting edge technology in 1988! Fast-forward a few years, and this little innovation and our passion for data has skyrocketed us to a Fortune 200 company and a leader in the world of data-driven decision-making. ', ' PhD in Computer Science (Machine Learning, Statistics, Math or equivalent) plus 5 years of experience in data analytics ', " Bachelor's Degree plus 9 years of experience in data analytics, or Master's Degree plus 7 years of experience in data analytics, or PhD plus 5 years of experience in data analytics ", ' At least 5 years of experience in Python, Scala, or R for large scale data analysis ', ' Team oriented: You excel at partnering with cross functional teams to champion the field of data science achieve collective goals ', 'In This Role, You Will', ' At least 3 year of experience working with AWS ', ' Build and deliver a comprehensive machine learning roadmap across bank customer life cycle from account opening to account management that enables customer base growth and faster access to money while preventing fraudulent activity ', " A Leader. You challenge conventional thinking and work with stakeholders to identify and improve the status quo. You're passionate about talent development for your own team and beyond ", 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Lead a data science team and build machine learning models through all phases of development, from design, testing, data gathering, training, evaluation, validation, and implementation ', 'The Ideal Candidate Is', ' Achiever. You at ease in a fast pace environment defending against fraud and are driven for action and get things done ', ' Build and deliver a comprehensive machine learning roadmap across bank customer life cycle from account opening to account management that enables customer base growth and faster access to money while preventing fraudulent activity  Partner with senior leaders and partner teams in problem framing and conception of ideas, develop consensus and execute on the machine learning agenda  Lead a data science team and build machine learning models through all phases of development, from design, testing, data gathering, training, evaluation, validation, and implementation  Partner with a cross-functional team of product managers, software engineers, and business analysts to launch machine learning solutions into production  Actively identify and manage model risks in line with model risk management policies  Identify, evaluate, and deploy new algorithms, data strategies, testing strategy, and implementation capabilities to drive continuous innovation  Lead, recruit, and grow a team of data scientists to achieve their professional goals ', 'At Least 3 Year Of Experience Managing People', ' Partner with a cross-functional team of product managers, software engineers, and business analysts to launch machine learning solutions into production ', ' Lead, recruit, and grow a team of data scientists to achieve their professional goals ', " The Customer Protection Data Science team has a relentless focus on the craft of data sciences spanning statistics, machine learning and distributed computing domains. Our relentless innovation is aimed towards continually identifying fraud attacks across every stage of the customer life cycle. You will be working with cross functional teams including product, engineers and business analysts to identify and enable real-time intelligent decisions as part of our defenses. This is core to delivering the Bank's mission of Changing Banking for Good as it will enable easy access to banking services to all consumers. ", " Experienced. You've built machine learning models over TB scale data, validated them, back tested them and know what it takes to launch them in a real-time production environment ", ' Capital One will consider sponsoring a new qualified applicant for employment authorization for this position.', " The mission of this role is to drive the continual transformation of Capital One Consumer Bank's Customer Protection Data Science division. As the leading machine learning group, defining the next generation of banking, you will drive innovation that hardens our defenses against various types of bank fraud. In this role, you'll be central to determining our vision and strategy for machine learning applications in fraud detection and prevention that deeply impact the lives and financial freedom of our 12 million consumer bank customers. ", 'Basic Qualifications', ' At least 10 years of experience applying machine learning to solve complex problems for large scale applications ', ' Innovative. You continually research and evaluate emerging technologies. You stay current on published state-of-the-art methods, technologies, and applications and seek out opportunities to apply them ', ' At least 4 years of experience in open source programming languages for large scale data analysis ', ' Actively identify and manage model risks in line with model risk management policies ', " As a Data Scientist at Capital One, you'll be part of a team that's leading the next wave of disruption at a whole new scale, using the latest in computing technologies and machine learning methods that operate across billions of customer records to unlock the big opportunities that help everyday people save money, time and agony in their financial lives. ", ' Identify, evaluate, and deploy new algorithms, data strategies, testing strategy, and implementation capabilities to drive continuous innovation ', ' Partner with senior leaders and partner teams in problem framing and conception of ideas, develop consensus and execute on the machine learning agenda ']
